thread.title: Nothing to do but forget this mess and move on
thread.title_full: Nothing to do but forget this mess and move on

author: Ed Burmila
title: Nothing to do but forget this mess and move on
text: Posts: 2,076 Nothing to do but forget this mess and move on Doesn't take a rocket scientist to know you can't turn the ball over 3 times, get hosed by the officials once, and kick 5 FG in the red zone and win a game. So today sucked, put it behind us. Come back strong against Detroit. They suck and we need to be focused. "I think Shipp would have had way more yards with the touches James has got." - SoCal Cards Fan Quote: Originally Posted by Ed Burmila Doesn't take a rocket scientist to know you can't turn the ball over 3 times, get hosed by the officials once, and kick 5 FG in the red zone and win a game. So today sucked, put it behind us. Come back strong against Detroit. They suck and we need to be focused. Agreed and will add that we sucked on D in the Red Zone as well. And it's too late to lose the weight you used to need to throw around. Pink Floyd No major injuries and should have Ellington added to the mix Location: Bullhead City, AZ Posts: 25,107 We did it to ourselves today. Had many chances to win and did not get it done. Hope the team learns a lesson on taking a team lightly and how they need to be focused at all times.
